structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Stolen Goods; Duty Of Arresting Officers To Secure
law.text: An officer who arrests a person charged as principal or accessory in a robbery or larceny shall secure the property which is alleged to have been stolen, annex a schedule thereof to his return and be answerable for the same; and, upon conviction of the offender, it shall be restored to the owner.
